statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName , AA.UserName , AA.UserType , M1.Name as UserTypeName , AA.LoginID , AA.UseYn , AA.Description FROM dbo.AAUser AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.ACCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UserType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'UserType' WHERE 1=1
AND AA.UserName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%'
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName , AA.UserName , AA.UserType , AA.LoginID , AA.UseYn , AA.Description FROM dbo.AAUser AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.AAUser ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, UserName, UserType, LoginID, Password, UseYn, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate() , #CreateBy# , #CreateByName# , #UserName# , #UserType# , #LoginID# , PWDENCRYPT(#LoginID#) , #UseYn# , #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update: UPDATE dbo.AAUser SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName= #UpdateByName# , UserName = #UserName# , UserType = #UserType# , LoginID = #LoginID# , UseYn = #UseYn# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
UPDATE dbo.AAUser SET Password = PWDENCRYPT(LoginID) , UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName= #UpdateByName# WHERE ID = #ID#

INSERT INTO dbo.AAUserPasswordHist ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, UserID, OldPassword, NewPassword ) SELECT GetDate() , #CreateBy# , #CreateByName# , #UserID# , Password , PWDENCRYPT(#Password#) FROM dbo.AAUser WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ID = #UserID#; UPDATE dbo.AAUser SET Password = PWDENCRYPT(#Password#) , UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName= #UpdateByName# WHERE ID = #ID#;
statements.select:
WITH CTE (ID, HierID, Level) AS ( SELECT AA.ID as ID , CAST(RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HierID , 1 AS Level FROM dbo.AAGroup AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.UseYn = 'Y' AND AA.ParentID IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT AA.ID as ID , CAST(BB.HierID + RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HierID , BB.Level + 1 AS Level FROM dbo.AAGroup AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CTE BB ON AA.ParentID = BB.ID WHERE AA.UseYn = 'Y' ) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.HierID) AS RowNo , CASE WHEN UG.ID IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE UG.UseYn END AS Checked , UG.ID , UG.CreateDate , UG.CreateBy , UG.CreateByName , UG.UpdateDate , UG.UpdateBy , UG.UpdateByName
, #ID# as UserID , AA.ID as GroupID , ISNULL(UG.UseYn,'N') as UseYn
, REPLICATE(' ', (AA.Level -1) * 5) + CASE WHEN AA.Level > 1 THEN '▶' ELSE '' END + BB.GroupName as GroupName , AA.HierID as HierID , AA.Level as GroupLevel
FROM CTE AA INNER JOIN dbo.AAGroup BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.AAUserGroup UG WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = UG.GroupID AND UG.UserID = #ID# ORDER BY RowNo

WITH CTE (ID, HierID, Level) AS ( SELECT AA.ID as ID , CAST(RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HierID , 1 AS Level FROM dbo.AARole AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.UseYn = 'Y' AND AA.ParentID IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT AA.ID as ID , CAST(BB.HierID + RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HierID , BB.Level + 1 AS Level FROM dbo.AARole AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN CTE BB ON AA.ParentID = BB.ID WHERE AA.UseYn = 'Y' ) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.HierID) AS RowNo , CASE WHEN UR.ID IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE UR.UseYn END AS Checked , UR.ID , UR.CreateDate , UR.CreateBy , UR.CreateByName , UR.UpdateDate , UR.UpdateBy , UR.UpdateByName
, #ID# as UserID , AA.ID as RoleID , REPLICATE(' ', (AA.Level -1) * 5) + CASE WHEN AA.Level > 1 THEN '▶' ELSE '' END + BB.RoleName as RoleName , ISNULL(UR.UseYn,'N') as UseYn
, AA.HierID as HierID , AA.Level as RoleLevel
FROM CTE AA INNER JOIN dbo.AARole BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.AAUserRole UR WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = UR.RoleID AND UR.UserID = #ID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName , AA.UserID , AA.OldPassword , AA.NewPassword FROM dbo.AAUserPasswordHist AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.UserID = #ID# ORDER BY RowNo
